downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, 2009 SP1, and 4.0 SP2 White Paper: Preparing for Single Euro Payments Area (SEPA)
downloadDescription: This document describes the current timeline when certain planned capabilities for the SEPA credit transfer and direct debit payment formats within Microsoft Dynamics AX will be delivered.
detailsSection: This document describes the current timeline when certain planned capabilities for the SEPA credit transfer and direct debit payment formats within Microsoft Dynamics AX will be delivered. At this time, there are no plans to support the SEPA Cards Framework for SEPA countries/regions and SEPA Direct Debit for Finland. For information about the support that is available for the different payment instruments within Microsoft Dynamics AX, see the overview section of this document.
systemRequirementsSection: • To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the manual in PDF file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
